item.title: Project Insanity - Hyperion Game Engine
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

before you read this, this is not Asterix. this is a clean PI with a hyperion’s game engine/tick/task/event/location and region system implemented.

features:

[ul][li]clean project insanity[/li]
[li]dupes fixed[/li]
[li]stable[/li]
[li]region fixes[/li]
[li]added a travelling folder, which contains docs for different travelling methods that you can implement[/li]
[li]i didn’t test yet, but it might have deadlocks - to fix just comment out sychronization[/li]
[li]hyperion’s tick/task/event/location and region system[/li][/ul]

and some other stuff…

i’m not going to give you a full spoon fed hyperion PI, so obviously there will be bugs.

protip:

when your in a region, and you go into a new region, sometimes NPC’s don’t load:

public void process() { /** * Add all LOCAL NPCs into a list */ for (int i = 0; i < PlayerHandler.players.length; i++) { if (PlayerHandler.players[i] != null) localNPCs.addAll(RegionManager.getLocalNpcsById((Client)PlayerHandler.players[i])); } /** * So we don't double-process... */ for (int npc : localNPCs) { if (!finalNPCs.contains(npc) && !ForceProcessNpcs.forcedList.contains(npc)) { finalNPCs.add(npc); } } localNPCs.clear(); /** * Process Forced NPCs */ for (int npc : ForceProcessNpcs.forcedList) { if (npc != -1) { Server.npcHandler.subProcess(npc); } } /** * Process them */ for (int npc : finalNPCs) { if (npc != -1 && NPCHandler.npcs[npc] != null) { Server.npcHandler.subProcess(npc); } } finalNPCs.clear(); }

figure the rest out.

Download it here
Mirror from nero

-Int Bauk

Read full topic
